on reading compounds: 好好爺【コウコウヤ】good-natured old man
kun reading compounds: 爺さん【じいさん】grandfather (may be used after name as honorific), male senior-citizen (may be used after name as honorific)
子泣き爺【こなきじじい】Konaki Jijii (a ghost in Japanese folklore with the shape of a small old man and having a baby's cry)
狸爺【たぬきじじい】cunning old man
